messages.best-desc-one: Yt1s is Free and Easy YouTube Downloader that Allows you to Convert and Download YouTube videos on Your Devices in multiple formats and best Quality. Using this Yt1s Downloader You can Download Unlimited Video and Audio on Your Mobile and other Devices without Any registration and without spending Money. So You can Play MP3 and MP4 without an internet connection.
messages.best-desc-two: Convert and download high-quality audio files in 64kbps, 128kbps, 192kbps, 256kbps, and 320kbps, and in different formats for free. Yt1s works flawlessly on All Devices including computers, tablets, and mobile devices. Yt1s also supports converting to many different formats such as MP3, MP4, M4V, FLV, WEBM, 3GP, WMV, AVI, etc without installing any special software or browser extensions.
messages.box-desc-one: Using our Youtube downloader is the fast and easy way to download and save any YouTube video to MP3 or MP4. Simply copy YouTube URL, paste it on the search box and click on "Convert" button. No register accounts needed.
messages.box-desc-two: Download and convert YouTube videos as much as you want without limitation and always free.
messages.box-desc-three: With the rising awareness of device security, people attach great importance to personal data. The service is totally clean with no virus under intense supervision based on security database.
messages.box-desc-four: We support all device platforms. Easy to convert YouTube videos to MP3 files regardless of whether you are using Windows, Mac or Linux, Android, iPhone.
messages.box-desc-five: We support all video and audio formats conversion. You can easily convert YouTube videos to MP3, 3GP, MP4, WMA, M4A, FLV, WEBM and MO formats, etc.
messages.box-desc-six: We support uploading the converted files to your DropBox and Google Drive.
messages.download-extensions-desc: Download Youtube videos with YT1s YouTube Downloader. By using our downloader you can easily convert YouTube videos to MP3, MP4, 3GP, WEBM, M4A files... and download them for free - this service works for computers, tablets and mobile devices. The videos are always converted in the highest available quality.
messages.how-download-desc-one: Paste YouTube url or enter keywords into the search box.
messages.how-download-desc-two: Choose output MP4 or MP3 format you want to convert and click Download button.
messages.how-download-desc-three: Wait until the conversion is completed and download the file. Very easy and fast.
messages.question-one: What is the fastest way to download Youtube videos?
messages.question-two: Is there any limit on the amount of downloaded files applied for users?
messages.question-three: What are the supported video/audio formats?
messages.question-four: What are the compatible devices for the conversion?
messages.question-five: How to download Youtube video to Android mobile phone?
messages.question-six: Where do the downloaded files get saved?
messages.answers-one-one: Access the Youtube URL you need to download.
messages.answers-one-two: Add "pp" after the word "youtube" then click "Enter". For example: youtube.com/watch?v=1PJIqpLInrw => youtubePP.com/watch?v=1PJIqpLInrw.
messages.answers-one-three: Select the file format you wish then click to "Download" button.
messages.answers-two: No. Our website allows users to convert and download unlimited amount of file and for free.
messages.answers-three: We offer a ton of conversion options and allow you to download MP4, 3GP, MP3 format. You can watch video right after that on your device without installing any other software.
messages.answers-four: We offer the service that is compatible with all PC devices, smart phones and tablets.
messages.answers-five-one: Access Youtube from your browser or open Youtube app on your Android device; after that, coppy the video URL you wish to download.
messages.answers-five-two: Paste the URL into the search box. You also can enter keyword to look for the video you wish.
messages.answers-five-three: Select the format you wish to download then tap "Download". After a few seconds, you can download the file.
messages.answers-six: Files you've downloaded are automatically saved in the Downloads folder or the "download history" section on your device.
